summary: Comprehensive testing of FixItNow Marketplace Pro app completed. Backend APIs are 92% functional (11/12 tests passed) with core Pro features working correctly. Frontend UI is fully functional with successful registration, login, and dashboard integration. The Pro workflow including registration, authentication, job browsing, quote submission with $10 budget deduction, and Stripe payment integration is working as expected.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns empty array instead of expected payment packages dictionary
minor_bugs.impact: Buy Credits page may not display package options correctly
minor_bugs.workaround: Admin endpoint /api/admin/payments/packages works correctly and returns packages from database

passed_tests: Pro Registration - Successfully creates new professional accounts
Pro Login - Authentication working with proper error handling
Pro Dashboard - Displays correct user data and business overview stats
Backend API Integration - All core endpoints functional (registration, login, profile, jobs, quotes)
Quote Submission - Correctly deducts $10 from weekly budget per quote
Budget Tracking - Weekly spent and budget amounts display accurately
Job Browsing - Available jobs display correctly from backend
Image Upload - Profile image upload functionality working
Stripe Integration - Checkout session creation successful
Navigation - All Pro app navigation links functional
Professional Branding - Consistent FixItNow Pro design and branding
Error Handling - Proper validation and error messages for invalid credentials
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix the /api/payments/packages endpoint to return the correct payment packages dictionary format instead of empty array. The endpoint should return the LEAD_CREDIT_PACKAGES constant or convert the database packages to the expected frontend format.
